your_titlepage: The title page gives you an overview of your Mapstory and can be customized with media. <1/> Click on the plus sign on the left side for your first slide.
click_on_map_to_set_marker: Click on the map or use the search function to add a marker.
move_the_red_marker: Click on the map or use the search function to move the red marker.
noMobile: Not optimized for smartphones or very small devices
noMobileText: MapStory is not optimized for smartphones or very small devices. Please use a desktop computer or a tablet in landscape mode.
